item.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

item.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations. (text of measure as introduced: CR S3923-3924)

bill.title: A resolution celebrating and reaffirming the strategic partnership between the United States and Romania on the twentieth anniversary of its inception.

item.text:
Celebrates 20 years of close, strategic partnership between the United States and Romania and affirms the desire to continue strengthening that partnership.

Applauds Romania's significant contributions and commitment to transatlantic security and prosperity.

Commends the Romanian government for its advancements in democratic governance, the rule of law, and a principled and inclusive society which provides opportunities for development and growth and urges continued progress.
item.name: Introduced in Senate

item.title: A resolution celebrating and reaffirming the strategic partnership between the United States and Romania on the twentieth anniversary of its inception.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
